Que dire ? Si vous avez aimé Half-Life, son remake Black Mesa ou Half-Life 2, alors vous aimerez Half-Life 2 : Episode One qui s'avère tout simplement indispensable, reprenant là où Half-Life 2 s'était arrêté.
Certes l'aventure est plus courte mais elle reste tout aussi passionnante et divertissante que celle de son aîné.
Depuis plusieurs années déjà cet épisode bénéficie en plus du moteur introduit avec Half-Life 2 : Episode Two, offrant des améliorations notamment en termes d'ombres et de lumières.
Il faudra se tourner quelques années plus tard vers le mod de Filip Victor : Half-Life 2 Update, officialisé par Valve, pour que Half-Life 2 a son tour soit au même niveau technique que ses deux suites.
A noter que comparé à Half-Life 2, le niveau de difficulté se montre ici plus élevé, les combats étant plus nerveux voire parfois rageants (satanés striders et hélicoptères du cartel).
La partie exploration n'est cependant pas en reste et permet de parcourir des cadres tels que la citadelle après la destruction du réacteur, des parkings sous-terrains, un hôpital ou encore une gare.
De nouveaux ennemis feront leur apparition : les Combines Zombies, bien plus dangereux que les Zombies traditionnels.
Même si la difficulté de ses combats peut être parfois frustrante ou décourageante, Half-Life 2 : Episode 1 reste donc un épisode indispensable à la hauteur de son aîné.

TL;DR: While the game is fun, its short (3 hour) length, and lackluster first 2 of the 5 levels lead me to have to only recommend picking it up on sale for $0.80 during every big steam sale.

This game is an ok sequel to Half-Life 2, but I can only recommend buying this on sale, and not at full price. Earlier today I finished Half-Life 2 and started up Episode 1, and well 170 minutes later I have completed the whole game. I finished it in a single sitting without even realizing it till the credits rolled. I would only recommend picking this up if you can get it on sale, even for $8. While the game has some great moments, the first couple chapters are a complete drag, as while they have interesting set pieces, the only weapon available is a gravity gun, and later on not even a supercharged one. You end up spending a lot of the time in earlier chapters shining your flashlight (which still drains too fast) at enemies and waiting for Alyx to pick them off for you. When you finally do get a gun, its behind a fence with a tiny hole in it in a completely dark room with headcrabs in it, and I ended up spending 5 minutes looking for it as you had to shoot off a lock to get out and eventually had to consult a walkthrough. However, the final few chapters, once the game picks up a bit, are really fun to play through. However, even with those fun final chapters, the game is still only 5 levels long and still only lasts about 3 hours, so while I can recommend it, DO NOT BUY AT FULL PRICE. Wait for the 90% off sales every summer/winter/spring/fall.

Açıkçası bu oyun tam bir hayal kırıklığı oynanış süresi kısa bu hiç sorun değil sonuçta bir expansion fakat şöyle bir durum var sadece 3 saatte bile oyun kendini tekrar ediyor hadi onu geçtim half life 2'nin üstüne hikaye ve yeni yerler dışında ne koymuşlar ki ? hikaye ve yeni yerlerde o kadar iyi değil bu arada hikaye kötü yeni mekanların bazıları iyi sadece fakat bu oyuna olumsuz vermemi engelleyen bir şey var bu oyun özünde half life 2 hala grafikleri fizikleri silahları oynanışı vuruş hissi harika zaten hl 2'yi hl 2 yapan bunlar ve bölüm çeşitliliğidir bu oyunda ise bölüm çeşitliliği hariç geri kalanlar var o yüzden oynanmayacak derecede kötü demiyorum ve unutmadan söyleyeyim şikayet ettiğim bir konu daha var alyx'i o kadar itici yapmışlar ki biz ölümle cebelleşiyoruz bu öyle oturuyor hayatta kalınca yanımıza gelip çok iyisin gordon falan diyor neyse eğer ki half life 2'yi beğendiyseniz tek oturuşta bitirebileceğiniz bir genişleme paketi sevmediyseniz ise bu çok daha katlanılmaz olacak

大礼包包含的，单买的话个人不太推荐，流程很短，几个小时就玩儿完了，大部分时候黑哩咕咚，随时都要开手电筒照，前面很长时间没有武器，就一把重力枪，爱丽克斯皮糙肉厚子弹无限自动回血，导致我全程摸鱼，遇到敌人往墙边一蹲，爱丽克斯会全部消灭掉，从头到尾没开几枪。如某个评价，爱丽克斯纯粹得像童话故事里面的女生，不真实，而且可爱又纯粹的爱丽克斯也不能改变游戏本身的可玩性，就这样吧。

Bueno, la continuacion directa del famoso HL2, aqui como es sabido se aposto por las entregas episodicas (obviamente) , mas cortitas y tal (3 horitas). Esto afecta en dos cosas, la variedad de situaciones, es muy inferior al HL2  (no se puede meter mucha variedad en tan poco tiempo) y segundo, tienes una experiensa mas concentrada, no hay paseos vacios ni escenarios repetitivos, las armas van llegando super rapido, en general un ritmo muy agradecido.
Creo que donde se aposto mas duro es en tu acompañante Alyx, que tiene mas protagonismo y dialogos que en HL2 original, en definitiva cae bien, es simpatica y tiene animaciones unicas.
En general me parece bueno, en definitiva, un poco corto, pero sin desperdicio.

This is a sweet and short DLC for the wonderful Valve game, Half Life 2. In this episode, you continue the story of Gordon Freeman; and must escape City 17 with Alyx Vance. Just to cut my review short, this was a well made little story. I don't have anything to say about; no things that put me off; or anything that I thought was a bit out there.

+Стрельба на 5,сказал бы я в 2006,а сейчас на твёрдую 3+

+Музыка
+Атмосфера пост апокалипсиса 
+Напарница Алекс довольно умная,например она может зажмурить глаза если на неё сильно светить фонариком(да этим уже никого не удивить,но игра 2006 года)
+отличный и глубокий сюжет(если считать 2-ю часть и эпизоды вместе взятыми)
+Просто потому что это халф лайф
